rows.text: I knew I was going to enjoy The Floatation Sanctuary - but I didn't realise how much I would love it. When you become aware that your body has acclimatised to the water... and you have lost a sense of your position in space... you're just a naked man, floating through the cosmos... I have no other experience to compare. It was pretty dang cool. I shared a couples pool and we both thoroughly enjoyed the experience. The lady running the show is informative, friendly and you get the sense that she genuinely cares, and wants you to have a wonderful time. And finally, the facility is absolutely world class, luxury, the kind of place you might expect to be rubbing shoulders with A-list kiwi celebrities like Sam Neil, or 'Munta' from Outrageous Fortune. I'll be back.

I have been going to yoga with Gabrielle for almost a year and can safely say it has changed my life. I have learn't breathing techniques that I now use on a daily basis, when I am anxious, stressed and for relaxation. These techniques can be done anywhere and have a huge impact on your health. Recently I have been having heart palpitations and was given a halter heart monitor which I had to wear for 24 hours this coincided with my yoga session and I found that after half an hour within the class the palpitations went away through the power of breath. Gabrielle caters to you as an individual as well as in the group, her calm and clear guidance makes you feel safe, happy and thoroughly relaxed, after sessions I feel like I have been to a spa and float right out the door!

Amazing!

The classes are nice and small, and the Hatha Vinyasa practice I have been going to is at a relaxed pace and focusses on good breathing and postural techniques.
In a short time I have seen improvements in my health, increased energy levels and reduced stress, as I take what I have learnt into daily life.
Gabrielle is very patient and understanding of different body types and experience levels.
Highly recommended!

I wish to let the management know about the great service we received from one of your young delightful staff today.  We are a couple of oldies and we do appreciate when we get looked after and not rushed especially with modern technology. Her name is Parez.   Please let her know how thankful we were. It's an okay store. However , the cram so many aisles into the store, it's impossible to get around with any efficiency.  They don't have an obvious 'click and collect ' location in store.  It's not made clear where it is.  For such a big store they refuse to employ many staff.  Lots of till waiting and absolutely no one on the shop floor for any help. It's just another 'profit only' driven commercial store. It's also way overpriced, and the same quality , if not better , can be found elsewhere like NZ Sale for way less $$$
Two ladies standing behind the counter chatting to themselves whilst customers lined up. Left young girl coping on her own
Brilliant place , great prices , well laid out eay navigate store.

Just been into New Plymouth branch to purchase some flannelette sheets. Lovely big bin with the sheets I require. Go to the checkout with my 2 packets only to be told these are full price...what??  There were same brands but different names in the bin that weren't on special. Bit of a rip off. Another lady was there as well and took photos because she gad the same problem. Ah well off to The Warehouse.
Looking for a few items, good selection
Friendly and helpful staff,  clean store and easy to find what you need.

Always enjoy my stay in Novotel New Plymouth, will choose this over other places in New Plymouth

I had the most amazing Facial & Pamper session. My skin has never looked and felt so amazing before, with the added bonus of calming down some inflamed acne. Incredibly relaxing, Am√©lie is so knowledgable and took a lot of time and care into the treatment. Would 1000% recommend booking in a treat for yourself or a loved one!

Walking into Cocoon is like stepping into a moment out of time.
As soon as I walk through the door, the atmosphere and energy show me that I need to drop my mum, wife or professional hat and just be me. Am√©lie, with her magician's fingers, transforms each treatment into an almost therapeutic experience. This treatment is not only good for the skin, but also for the soul and spirit.
Having hypersensitive and reactive skin, it's often difficult to find suitable products. Here, not only are the products clean, but Am√©lie ensures that each product is perfectly suited to my skin type.
The only negative point in all this? You never want it to end!
This space offers a luxurious treatment and experience that you'd find at the big European addresses - no doubt thanks to Am√©lie's previous experience - with Kiwi values like generosity, warmth and kindness. An appointment with her is the promise of a divine, rejuvenating moment. A must for anyone looking to be pampered in an exceptional environment. :)

My Zoom experience with Amelie was so great! She has a wealth of useful & relevant knowledge, and her make up advice was absolutely spot. Such a shame we‚Äôre in different cities so I can‚Äôt make the most of her services but happy to have online as an option!

Absolutely incredible experience every time! I love Am√©lie‚Äôs cocoon- the space is so calming and inviting, love her energy- she is understanding and considerate.
I love that she does a thorough research and the only one in New Plymouth who uses clean products. It is important to me and it‚Äôs great that I do not have to think about it!
I have a monthly package with her and it is wonderful to know that I have this time just for myself. This is a very rare moment of peace as a mum and I always leave relaxed and rejuvenated.
A beautifully relaxing and rejuvenating experience, with a glowing dewy complexion at the end

I have been to Amelie's a few times now and have just signed up to a package deal with her.  I love how welcome you feel when you enter the cocoon and how she takes the time to truly understand your skin and the journey you need to go on in order to achieve what you want.  I love how the facials make my skin feel and look forward to doing the skin 101 package, I'm excited to get my skin back to a healthy glow and to finally take time to allow myself to be pampered.

My time at Amelie's was everything I needed. The facial literally changed the shape of my face (thanks to the lymphatic drainage massage!) and I felt feeling sooo relaxed. Not only is Amelie great at the actual facial, but she focuses on all the little details to make sure the whole space and experience is precious.

A beautiful and inviting experience with Amelie.  The space is beautifully laid out and was ‚Äúnot‚Äùheavily scented with chemicals or random products which I was pleased to find.  We went thru a very through process to discuss and examine my skin type, before applying products.  This made me extremely happy, as I don‚Äôt like to apply just anything to my skin.  I had noticeable results from our session, and was pleased with the results.  Would recommend to anyone.

Just started the 12 month full body relaxing massage package. These appointments are a true moment of zen! Am√©lie makes you feel at ease from the moment you walk through the door and the attentive questions before the massage really makes sure you get what you need from each appointment.
I really love my time in the Cocoon! I felt completely relaxed in Am√©lie's care. My skin felt amazing afterwards too. I even saw a reduction in puffiness!
